testcase.name: When I send PUT request to the the application using a valid payload to update an User
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to update new created user

testcase.name: Then I will get status code 200
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to update new created user

testcase.name: And I verify if user has been updated
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to update new created user

testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to update new created user

testcase.name: When I send Delete request to the the application using userId
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to delete new created user

testcase.name: Then I will get status code 204
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to delete new created user

testcase.name: And I verify if user has been deleted
testcase.classname: Scenario: I want to delete new created user
